unauthenticated.noAccount: If you do not have a GC Forms account,
unauthenticated.title: Sign in to access responses

card.noResponsesToDownload: There are no responses available to download.

notifications.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Only {{max}} responses can be downloaded at a time.
notifications.trySelectingLessFiles: You have {{max}} responses selected. Uncheck at least 1 response before downloading.
notifications.atLeastOneFileHeader: At least one file must be selected to download.
notifications.atLeastOneFile: Try selecting at least one file to download.
notifications.errorDownloadingFiles: Try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists contact support.[developer]

notifications.maxEntriesTitle: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.
notifications.maxEntriesDescription: Enter these form entries before entering more.[developer]

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. They look like, c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up-to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm, responses are available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report problems with responses
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that won't download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: The problem will be reported, and someone will contact you with help.

notifications.entriesLengthHeader: At least one entry is required[developer]
notifications.entriesLengthDescription: Please add at least one entry and try submitting again.[developer]
notifications.clientEntryHeader: An error occurred with one of the entries[developer]
notifications.clientEntryDescription: Please double check the entries are entered correct and try again.[developer]
notifications.unknownErrorDescription: Please try again in a few minutes. If the problem continues, try contacting support.[developer]
